title: Bug 18705: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: Excessive flashing is observed in the Control Example. This bug aims to understand why the flashing occurs and provide a solution to mitigate it.
OB: When running the Control Example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it can be observed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
EB: The expected behavior is that there should be no excessive flashing when resizing the window.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps: 
1. Run the Control Example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash.
